verses.name: Exodus 36:16
verses.text: And he coupled five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves.

verses.name: Exodus 36:17
verses.text: And he made fifty loops upon the uttermost edge of the curtain in the coupling, and fifty loops made he upon the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second.

verses.name: Exodus 36:18
verses.text: And he made fifty taches of brass to couple the tent together, that it might be one.

verses.name: Exodus 36:19
verses.text: And he made a covering for the tent of rams’ skins dyed red, and a covering of badgers’ skins above that.

verses.name: Exodus 36:20
verses.text: And he made boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood, standing up.
